text: What new features do you want to see in iOS 19?

I’ve been saying this for years now: I want a redesigned Notification Center that doesn’t look like the look screen. I’ve never understood it and I miss the old one from iOS 5.
Redesign and Bug Fixes
yo, iOS 19 needs AI that vibes with your music library—auto-sync visuals to beats so your camera roll becomes a mood reel. creators could remix memories like mixtapes. wild, right?
Would be great if they could fix iOS 18 first.
Nothing much , control heating that’s all
Call translation is a feature that I've been waiting for for a while

None.

In iOS 19, I want the equivalent of “iOS Snow Leopard.”

I want Apple to take a breather and fully concentrate on performance; bug fixes; streamlined, efficient code; an updated, more robust kernel—the solid foundation upon which all else runs.

Bertrand Serlet, WWDC 2009:

Revamped keyboard
fonts
new ui

#One click to place the cursor wherever you want it to be.
I challenge @Apple

An actually intelligent Apple Intelligence  When I read that the “demo” they presented in the pre-recorded videos were just mock ups, they lost trust with so many folks. This is why they need to go back to doing LIVE Keynotes. @craigfederighi @tim_cook @gregjoz

MAKE MY KEYBOARD SOUND NOT SUDDENLY JUMP TO 3000%

Thanks.
The ability to when downloading an app, it gives you the option where to move it you have folders created.
wallpapers in iMessage

Need these features in iOS 19:

 A "Find My Motivation" app that actually locates your lost willpower and ambition.

 Siri that can read your mind so you don't have to struggle with voice commands that it misunderstands anyway.

 Battery life that lasts longer than your

The ability to increase the current 4x4 grid size..
I want access to the control center by swiping from the bottom right of the screen.

A major overhaul in the design

Support for real-time language translation with Airpods would be outstanding. I'd also love to see some actual Siri improvements, instead of the "do you want me to use ChatGPT to answer that?". Apple Intelligence has been a fairly useless feature so far.
Less bloat.

Charging iPhone wirelessly from a distance of 1 to 4 meters from the charger

Less bugs and more continuity man. I can’t be swiping to go back for 2 menus and having to tap the back arrow in the top left of another 2 menus in the same app. It drives me insane!! 3rd party apps, yes but apple should force it down their throats if need be.
I want to be able to save driving ROUTES on maps, with predetermined stops along the route for long distance trips I take regularly.
Landscape everything, split screen, pinnable albums/playlists in music app
Always On Display needs brightness control and shouldn't show media info. It's unnecessary and kinda annoying, especially since tapping doesn't work and playback time isn't real-time.
I would like to see iOS 18 function before moving forward.
nothing much, just linking my apple pen to my phone will be enough
